   .. py:attribute:: has_cs
      :value: True



   .. py:property:: x

      Return the X component of the Point.


   .. py:property:: y

      Return the Y component of the Point.


   .. py:property:: z

      Return the Z component of the Point.


   .. py:property:: tuple

      Return a tuple of the point.
